titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 534) to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit human cloning.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-21, by Mrs. Myrick.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 534 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 7.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 105.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

reference.label: text of measure as passed House

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/27/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on February 26, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 534 (prohibiting human cloning).
